meanings.definition: A person who has controlling authority in a firm or organization.
meanings.sent1: The school principal ensures everything runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The principal of the company made the final decision.
meanings.sent3: The principal decided to join the office basketball team for fun.
meanings.sent4: She is the principal of the chessboard, strategizing every move.
meanings.sent5: The principal's office is at the heart of the school, always bustling with activity.

meanings.definition: A sum of money lent or invested, on which interest is paid.
meanings.sent1: I deposited my savings into the principal amount.
meanings.sent2: The bank calculates interest based on the principal.
meanings.sent3: The principal in the piggy bank grew bigger each week.
meanings.sent4: Her investment was the principal in her financial success story.
meanings.sent5: The principal in the account kept growing, bringing a smile to his face.

meanings.definition: First in order of importance; main.
meanings.sent1: The principal reason for his absence was illness.
meanings.sent2: Her principal goal was to finish the race.
meanings.sent3: The principal dish at the restaurant was a delicious pasta.
meanings.sent4: The principal character in the story was a brave knight.
meanings.sent5: The principal idea behind the project was innovation.
